committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill relating to the authorization of appropriations for certain components of the National Wildlife Refuge System.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the Act which established the Bon Secour National Wildlife Refuge, Alabama, to increase the authorization of appropriations, which shall remain available until expended. Amends the Act which established the Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge, Louisiana, to increase the authorization of appropriations, which shall remain available until expended. Amends the Act which established the Bogue Chitto National Wildlife Refuge, Louisiana and Mississippi, to increase the authorization of appropriations, which shall remain available until expended. Amends the Act which established the Tinicum National Environmental Center to make the authorization of appropriations available until expended.

titles.title: A bill relating to the authorization of appropriations for certain components of the National Wildlife Refuge System.
